card-projects.title: GottaGoFast
card-projects.description: Project developed using Flutter for the frontend and C# for the backend, designed to simplify car rentals.

card-projects.title: BookFlow
card-projects.description: A project built with Angular and Spring Boot that connects authors, publishers, and readers to deliver an engaging and convenient reading experience.

card-projects.title: AgroConnect
card-projects.description: A web-based management system designed for guinea pig farms. It enables breeders to track expenses, manage resources, and schedule expert consultations. The backend was built with Spring Boot, while the frontend leverages Angular for an interactive user experience.

card-projects.title: AgroSupport
card-projects.description: A mobile application developed to connect farmers with expert advisors. It enables users to schedule consultations, view expert posts, personalize their profiles, and manage their consultation history. The backend was implemented with Spring Boot, and the mobile frontend was developed in Kotlin using Jetpack Compose.

card-projects.title: AlquilaFacil
card-projects.description: An application for searching and renting event spaces, developed using Flutter for the frontend, .NET Core for the backend, and MySQL as the database. Firebase services were integrated for authentication, along with additional services for image management and PayPal for handling payments.

card-projects.title: ArtCollab
card-projects.description: An application designed for collaboration between artists and writers. Registered users can explore popular works by genre and, if they are artists or writers, earn commissions for each published piece.

full-page-project.title: GottaGoFast
full-page-project.description: A project developed using Flutter for the frontend and C# for the backend, designed to streamline car rentals with speed and convenience. The app provides an intuitive user interface and robust backend functionality to ensure a seamless booking experience.

items.description: Vehicle Search and Filters

full-page-project.title: BookFlow
full-page-project.description: A project built with Angular for the frontend and Spring Boot for the backend, designed to connect authors, publishers, and readers in a dynamic and engaging way. The platform enhances the reading experience with innovative features and a vast library of content.

items.title: Feature 1
items.description: Virtual Book Clubs

items.title: Feature 2
items.description: Author Events

items.title: Feature 3
items.description: Premium Content

full-page-project.title: AgroConnect
full-page-project.description: AgroConnect is a comprehensive web-based system designed for efficient management of guinea pig farms. It allows breeders to seamlessly track operational expenses, manage resources, and schedule consultations with sector experts. The backend is powered by Spring Boot, while the interactive frontend is built with Angular, ensuring an optimized user experience. This project follows Domain-Driven Design (DDD) principles, ensuring a robust, scalable system for both current and future use cases.

items.title: Expense Tracking
items.description: Easily track expenses related to guinea pig farming, enabling better financial management.

items.title: Resource Management
items.description: Streamlined management of resources, including food and care items for the guinea pigs.

items.title: Consultation Scheduling
items.description: Schedule consultations with expert advisors, ensuring timely advice for farm optimization.

full-page-project.title: AgroSupport
full-page-project.description: AgroSupport is a mobile application designed to connect guinea pig breeders with expert advisors. It allows users to schedule consultations, view posts from experts, personalize their profiles, and manage their consultation history. The backend is developed using Spring Boot, while the mobile frontend leverages Kotlin and Jetpack Compose to provide a seamless and user-friendly experience on Android devices. AgroSupport integrates real-time scheduling and communication, promoting growth and development for guinea pig farmers.

items.title: Consultation Scheduling
items.description: Users can easily schedule and manage consultations with expert advisors directly within the app.

items.title: Expert Posts
items.description: Stay informed with the latest posts and articles shared by industry experts to enhance farm operations.

items.title: Profile Customization
items.description: Farmers and experts can personalize their profiles to improve engagement and networking.

full-page-project.title: AlquilaFacil
full-page-project.description: An application for searching and renting event spaces, developed using Flutter for the frontend, .NET Core for the backend, and MySQL as the database. Firebase services were integrated for authentication, along with additional services for image management and PayPal for handling payments.

items.title: Booking
items.description: Reservations for spaces published in the application

items.title: Booking Managament
items.description: Reservations management using a calendar for manage the reservations schedule

items.title: Search spaces by filters
items.description: Search space by your preferences like districts that you prefer or by capacity range or space type.

items.title: Publish space
items.description: Publish your space for users could see and make a reservation.

items.title: Save space to favorites
items.description: Save your favorite space for never lost it.

items.title: See notifications
items.description: See notifications when someone make a reservation for your own space or when you subscribe to premium plan.

items.title: Premium plan
items.description: Subscribe to premium plan for get more beneficts when you make a reservation for any space.

items.title: Payment
items.description: Make a payment for your reservation using PayPal.

items.title: Make a review for the space
items.description: Make a review for the space that you reserved.
